commitMessage:
@@@Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=49730
Race condition in executor can lead to long delays in request processing

@@@Correct off-by-one error in thread pool that allowed thread pools to increase in size to one more than the configured limit.
Patch provided by usc.
This closes #104
